results.title: Metformin reduces prion infection in neuronal cells by enhancing autophagy.
results.text_hl: @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@Metformin@@@ was reported to be beneficial in various @<m>DISEASE_Proteostasis_Deficiencies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057165 @@@protein misfolding@@@ and @DISEASE_Neurodegenerative_Diseases @DISEASE_MESH:D019636 @@@neurodegenerative diseases@@@ like @DISEASE_Huntington_Disease @DISEASE_MESH:D006816 @@@Alzheimer's and Huntington's diseases@@@.

citations.NLM: Abdelaziz DH, Thapa S, Abdulrahman B, Vankuppeveld L, Schatzl HM. Metformin reduces prion infection in neuronal cells by enhancing autophagy. Biochem Biophys Res Commun. 2020 Mar 5;523(2):423-428. PMID: 31874705
citations.BibTeX: @article{31874705, title={Metformin reduces prion infection in neuronal cells by enhancing autophagy.}, author={Abdelaziz DH and Thapa S and Abdulrahman B and Vankuppeveld L and Schatzl HM}, journal={Biochem Biophys Res Commun}, volume={523}, number={2}, pages={423-428}}

results.title: Metformin increases phagocytosis and acidifies lysosomal/endosomal compartments in AMPK-dependent manner in rat primary microglia.
results.text_hl: Since degradation of proteins in lysosomal/endosomal compartments depends largely on their phagocytosis and acidification, @<m>CHEMICAL_Metformin</m> @CHEMICAL_MESH:D008687 @@@metformin@@@ may be beneficial in @<m>DISEASE_Proteostasis_Deficiencies</m> @DISEASE_MESH:D057165 @@@proteinopathies@@@ affecting the brain.

citations.NLM: Labuzek K, Liber S, Gabryel B, Adamczyk J, Okopień B. Metformin increases phagocytosis and acidifies lysosomal/endosomal compartments in AMPK-dependent manner in rat primary microglia. Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol. 2010 Feb;381(2):171-86. PMID: 20012266
citations.BibTeX: @article{20012266, title={Metformin increases phagocytosis and acidifies lysosomal/endosomal compartments in AMPK-dependent manner in rat primary microglia.}, author={Labuzek K and Liber S and Gabryel B and Adamczyk J and Okopień B}, journal={Naunyn Schmiedebergs Arch Pharmacol}, volume={381}, number={2}, pages={171-86}}
